alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 20 at 3:16AM MDT until April 22 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM FRIDAY TO 9 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Locally higher amounts are possible. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains and Flat Tops. * WHEN...From 9 AM Friday to 9 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops
